website_summaries.verdict: Strong and well-constructed—the perfect shelving solution for entertainment systems.
pros: Adjustable height shelves allow you to fit in most video or gaming systems
Features a cable management system at the rear of the bracket to hide messy cables
cons: Must be mounted on a sturdy wall

customer_reviews.title: The floating shelf is very sturdy also and makes everything look so much clean line
customer_reviews.text: We used this floating shelf in our game room and eliminated the Tv stand that we had and what a difference it made. The floating shelf is very sturdy also and makes everything look so much clean line. I'm going to purchase another one for our pool table room.
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: However it was easy to assemble and no problems with the return and ...
customer_reviews.text: I read in some of the Questions that it would hold the gaming systems and it will if you don't mind them hanging halfway off the shelf. The plugs in the back of the system pushes the front off and if you have a power supply unit you can forget it altogether. However it was easy to assemble and no problems with the return and that is why I gave it a 3 star. This could hold modems or routers, not the game systems.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent S.

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, good for the price, I installed it on top of TV as it is in an awkward wall in bedroom Looks good
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Have had installed in my room for approximately 7 months now. PS4 and cable box are on it, and it hasn't made a peep since the day I put it up. Dust it here and there and it will be fine. Hides wires well too once you figure it out! I mounted the shelf very close to the bottom of the TV in order to conceal the rest of the wiring. No strays for me! (minus the one running to the outlet)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! It was just what I was looking for to hold my PlayStation 3, some games and other electronics! Oh, and about mounting.. This was mounted in a converted garage. The walls in this room consist of drywall placed over concrete block. Concrete block being what many homes in Florida are made from. I was able to mount this into my wall with the hardware included..no extra hardware required..but you will need masonry drill bits and a drill to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product does what it's intended for. If you own an Xbox s one than it fits perfectly. Other consoles I'm not sure about. I wouldn't put too much weight on it, but all in all I'm very pleased. Still trying to figure how to put the cords wrapped in the back but I'll probably just zip tie them if all else fails. Installation was pretty easy only took about 45 minutes all together
customer_reviews.author: Keren

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic Bargain and a Great Looking Unit
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a shelf to rid our already cluttered workspace of our router. I happened to see this unit and, for only $11, I gave it a try. As you can see in the picture, it's a perfectly sized shelf for our Nighthawk. I also used the Cable Management Sleeve II, , with two clipped together. I am very pleased with this product as it met all of our objectives of securely holding the router with ample room, and looking very nice when paired together. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunker

customer_reviews.title: Looks Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this triple floating shelf system. My challenge was the cable management built into it (hence 4 stars) and all the power and audio cables to hide. Since my amp alone was about 17 lbs, had to make some adjustments . First used mushroom head toggle bolt wall anchors to withstand the weight. Second, I use nylon cable sleeve to hide all the cables; three HDMI, three power cables, one RCA cable and two speaker wires. Also had to use 270 degrees HDMI angled adapters to gain back space due to the speakers connectors & HDMI inputs on the back of the amp.It came out the way I planned it. Few pics attached.
customer_reviews.author: Otto M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Good and strong. Used for cable box.
customer_reviews.author: frederick kanakry

customer_reviews.title: Another thing that looks nice but has no practical function.
customer_reviews.text: The Allen screws used to secure the shelves are in the worst possible position. They are literally impossible to get to if you want to reduce the space between the shelves. Furthermore, it seems these screws are mild steel, the provided Allen wrence is harder than the screws meaning by the time you get it set up all the Allen screws are stripped out. Also, the shelves are too small for a stereo or av receiver so really what's the point in running wires up to a blue ray player or a cable box from a receiver that's located elsewhere? I bought this in November, just installed in March. Otherwise it would be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good but a few things to note
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product for the price. Looks good. A couple of things to know. It wont hold a lot of weight. Its good for a cable box or dvr but nothing more. Last, the cords come out the side which is fine except that the bottom and top caps of the vertical bar dont have cut outs for chords.
customer_reviews.author: KGR

customer_reviews.title: Price is right and thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Great value and great service from Amazon. Small plate was defective and Amazon replaced in less than 24 hours. Hope some Chinese guy wasn't executed for this screw up! Easily installed even with silly instructions. Appears to be very durable and most attractive. Just don't use brick wall anchors with drywall because you don't need to hit a stud but must get appropriate anchors for the supplied screws. Price is right. Found it cheaper than fashioning a shelf from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Hasselbach

customer_reviews.title: Could so easily be much better
customer_reviews.text: Calls for 4 3mm "reserve space" which I assume refers to the black washers of which only 2 were present. They did include 6 screws, although only 4 were needed. The mounting plates were extremely difficult to hold in alignment until the screws were started. The plastic pieces which I assume were for cable management were flimsy. Only 3 were provided when there was space for 4. I decided to ignore them. Once assembled, the basic shelves were fairly good.
customer_reviews.author: CDR Oso

customer_reviews.title: No instructions, Main piece is stripped and can't get the 2nd half of base attached. waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Finally got my stepdad over to help me mount this correctly and guess what- we open the box and no instructions. GREAT! Found them online, extremely unclear and one of the bolts that allow the second part of the base to slide on is too far out and stripped and essentially useless so we can't even put the shelf together. what a piece of crap and waste of money. wish I'd opened this sooner so I could return it- useless.
customer_reviews.author: AcuPUNKture

customer_reviews.title: Great for Internet Items
customer_reviews.text: We installed this in the closet, right next to the central box for our coax and ethernet cables. It's quite sturdy and will be the perfect size for our cable model, router, and Network Attached Storage. The only negative is with the cable management. They have a track with prongs to hold your cables in place. However, once installed on the wall, you can't fit more than one cable in place because of how little space there is and how little they bend.
customer_reviews.author: jp be me

customer_reviews.title: Well made item! Easy to install..looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality made item,I purchased the 2 shelf version,very easy to install..4 mounting screws...2 shelf screws..My weight was well lower than what the item says it can support...but I went into drywall would be stronger going into wood but I decided just the anchors and screws would do what I needed(I always recommend anchoring into wood though.It looks great and the fact that the shelves have a curved front worked great for me...out of the bathroom and in to the closet..Highly recommend this item...I'm buying many more of them. Stephanie M. Florida
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: worse than the Destruction of the Great Sept of Baelor
customer_reviews.text: Granted, I've had this shelf system in place for about a year now. But there is no excuse for what just happened... I was minding my own business binge watching Game of Thrones and the bottom glass shelf exploded into a million pieces, worse than the Destruction of the Great Sept of Baelor. Cersei's wildfire had the same impact to those people that the pressure of nothing had to this glass shelf. It was sitting empty. My daughters toys are located directly below this shelf. I spent two hours checking them for shards of glass and cleaning up glass from all over. I would exercise caution with this shelf. Go with wood instead.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Overall its okay. The instructions are really bad and kind of out of order. The "cable management" doesnt really work so i have loose cables everywhere. Even when tightened max the shelves will rotate if its slightly bumped and I've already had things fall off of it After a few days of having it. Cant really return it since i already installed it and threw away the box. Overall was hoping for more out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that worked out great
customer_reviews.text: I used this to hang a 32" Samsung TV high up near the ceiling in our bedroom. This mount was very nice to work with. It came with a ton of different fasteners, so it would fit just about any TV or mounting situation that you can imagine, and it ever came with a torpedo level to help newbies with the install. Just a plastic level, but heck it worked fine and they didn't have to send it at all. Shows me they really wanted to provide a quality product. I was very impressed. The tilt, swivel, and extendable arms all worked well, and more importantly, lock very securely.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Pounds

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product and Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: My sister is a recent resident of an Assisted Living facility. Cable company installed modem & phone, and both were sitting on the floor, an obvious tripping hazard; therefore, the need for shelving. My brother, a retired custom home builder, read the directions and installed in less than 30 minutes. He used his power drill, and the Allen wrench that was included with all the necessary hardware. He and the facilities manager were both impressed with the quality of the tempered glass shelving and ease of installation. Now, I just need to tidy up all the hanging cable wires to make things look nice. The packaging was very good, ensuring that the tempered glass was well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Ray

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and get it.
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. Only reason I'm giving it a 4 is because the instructions were very vague and not at all detailed. I winged it and made it work out for my needs perfectly. Very sturdy. Well packaged. Jewelry box is about 10lbs but I wouldnt put anything heavier on that shelf. The fact that they could be made into two shelves was super awesome because I needed room for the kid in my jewelry box to fully open. This was perfect for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity

customer_reviews.title: High quality, inexpensive DVD player shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product that was fairly easy to install. The instructions could be improved upon. It says there are 4 holes to be drilled, but there are only 2 (which are plenty if you are mounting to a wooden stud). My DVD player barely fits on it, so you may want to measure your device's width before ordering this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for a xbox 360 so that says alot
customer_reviews.text: I liked how strong the tempered glass feels when you install the final piece together as instructed. I bought 2 of these and have an xbox 360 on one shelf and on top I have 4 controllers and 15 games and the stand holds firm. The other is in my son's game room and is holding a PS4 on one shelf and the top shelf is holding 2 controllers and about 8 games. Would highly recommend if you need it for any console or media player.
customer_reviews.author: Marc M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV Component Holder and Wire Hider
customer_reviews.text: This this is built like a tank. It's very sturdy and really stuck to the wall hard. I used special sheet rock bolts instead of the hardware included which was meant for wood studs (which I don't have in a modern high rise building). The shelves are sturdy too. I only needed one, so I will save the second for for the future. The wire hiders could be a little bigger, but I was able to smush all of them in each side after some effort. I would highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: although the directions weren't that detailed, its easy for someone like me to pick up, but not all will and I seen the comments. Anyway, it's a nice mounted shelf. Was able to run a raceway (apartment life) down to the shelf, and from there, run the cables down the sides of the mount. You can hardly see any cables, besides the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lourido

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the picture fool you!
customer_reviews.text: This does what it is supposed to. That is all. The picture shows the shelf sitting way off to the side of the wall mount. Don't you believe it. That shelf moves maybe two to three inches and becomes unstable after about 3 inches. It's mount has a screw hole for the shelf that, when used, puts the shelf in the middle of the mount. Don't get me wrong, for the price it is a great wall mount shelf for DVD, DVR or the like. But it is fooling you into believing that you can move the shelf virtually anywhere you want on the mount. You cannot.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: I felt this stuck out way too far and was too bulky for the area I was going to use it. I was trying to free up space on my sideboard that my TV was above but it stuck out so far forward that it looked better just placing DVD player on my sideboard. I ended up returning it. I believe if you need it just freestanding on the wall below TV you would probably be happy with it, just didn’t suit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple wall mounted shelf
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple wall mounted shelf. Took about 10 minutes to unpack and hang. Very simple! Works great and is very solid. Looks very nice! Just big enough for a DVD player or cable box.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with item.
customer_reviews.text: This shelf worked for what i needed it for. I needed it to elevate some of my consoles up off an entertainment unit so i could fit more things ontop of the table. It was pretty easy to get it put together but cable management was a bit of a hassle, i ended up using some cable ties to get the cords looking clean. The only fault i have with this unit is that one of the glass shelves came with a small part chipped off the front of the glass. But it didnt cause any sort of cracking or splitting in the rest of the shelf so i left it how it was. over all im pretty happy
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: it's Okay...
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's just okay - installation is fairly easy. I really like the cord hide built into the wall mount and was able to hide most of my cords but the retaining plate is plastic and will only hold a certain diameter cord. Be aware that the shelves themselves are very small compared to my PS4 that hangs off the front end and my blue ray player/ surround sound device that hangs over all edges. the only thing that actually fits is my Direct TV receiver. that was why I only gave it 3 starts - the shelves are just small.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect shelf for your modem and router.
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is the perfect accessory for your Internet modem and router. It installs easily into a wall stud. You can put your modem on the bottom shelf and your wireless router on the top. For the best performance, your wireless router should be installed high up and near the center of the home. Install it into the same stud that your electrical outlet box is mounted to below. Plug in your modem and router and raise the shelf to the maximum height that your power cords will allow. Mark this location and install the shelf with the provided screws.
customer_reviews.author: Don DraperTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: I like how the product is on the wall it opened up so much space on my floor when we got rid of our tv stand the two shelves can be adjusted as well I happened to use it for my cable box and DVD player. I am going to try n tie up the access cables to make it look a little more better other than that I'm still satisfied with this purchase. It was well packaged and delivered when promised in great condition. I only used a screwdriver to mount the shelf to the wall didnt bother using a drill. Easy to read instructions didnt take long to assemble at all. Very happy with this purchase. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Used as intended (minimal contact) I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically pleasant. Functional within limits. Still a bit wobbly after install. Inherently limited by use of allen screws and glass shelves. Likely reasonable performance for holding DVD player etc as designed. If you have to use "hands on" for items placed on these shelves, they will move slightly. So if this is across the room and you only touch it with a remote control it's 5 stars. I am using in my music room for laptop and mixer and shelves shift a little when I put any pressure on them. Used as intended (minimal contact) I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, but One Issue
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking shelf, and seems pretty sturdy. I like that it has a built-in cable management system, though it is a bit difficult to use. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that the secondary piece that extends the shelves so that there is more room doesn't quite line up with the primary backing piece. When you screw these together, they're just a little off, and it makes it difficult to get the shelves to move from one piece to the other where the two join together.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Covalt

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t fit a PS4 console
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this but it won’t fit a PS4 console. It totally hangs over the front. One glass shelf also had a cracked off corner that wasn’t from shipping. The shelf itself is an ok quality and it seems like it would hold a good amount of weight. I wasn’t very impressed with the caps on the top and bottom of the base. They didn’t fit flush with the base that’s attached to the wall so having to put them on at the end (per instructions) was a pain and marred the wall.
customer_reviews.author: ITEOTB

customer_reviews.title: can't believe the price vs product. great value!
customer_reviews.text: love it. so easy to install. came with everything you would need whether you're installing into wood studs or concrete. put mine in studs and it's sturdy as can be. just 2 simple screws that are included. another 3 tiny bolts and you're ready to go. good design. beautiful glass. flawless manufacturing. very nice price. I actually have my computer monitor which is a 27 inch TV sitting on it. very pleased with how my setup came out. love that you can adjust the height. overall great product for a variety of needs.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Great floating shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love this floating shelf. Works we'll and looks really good. If your setup is like mine I'd recommend ordering two if nothing more than for looks. I had to mount myn off center so I'll be ordering a second to put on the stud to the right for more shelf space and aesthetics. Edit 12/19/17 Still love this shelving system. Added in a new picture showing the two side by side
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy Assembly, Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Usually I build all of my own shelves and route them out to make them look fancy, we just mounted our TV and this shelf had a ton of good reviews and rightfully so. The instructions are straight forward and doesn't take 30 minutes to completely assemble and setup media to TV. Hiding the cords was a little tough, but look great compared to just dangling in the open. Also for less than $20 I couldn't buy 4 shelf brackets to build my own and it would have taken quite a bit longer. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Orrel

customer_reviews.title: Super sleek and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My friends Dad mounted this under my TV after the guy I hired mounted my new TV. Love the look. Is stable and sturdy to hold my most prized possession, my GOW XBox 1. And my Skull. Perfect for my room. I didn’t get a chance to tuck in the cords before he drilled it into the wall tho but I wasn’t sure of permanent placing for stuff and needed a splitter so I wouldn’t have to go back and forth between my XBox and Firestick. You’d figure a TV like this would have at LEAST 3 or more ports. Love my new setup tho.
customer_reviews.author: Death2Barbie

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This works for what I needed it for. It's up and out of the way. I live in a small space so it's out of the way. However, I have 3 cats and they are curious and want to jump up there. I'm afraid if they do it's not sturdy enough to hold them and it will rip out of the wall. I'm trying to find something I can put back there to deter them from jumping up.
customer_reviews.author: fyergoddess

customer_reviews.title: Cords feed out the side
customer_reviews.text: The cords do not go straight out the bottom of the shelf. There is an end you put there to keep the side tracks in. You will need to feed them out of the side tracks which makes the cords more visible. Only one cord through each slot on the sides. So if you are trying to hide cords this shelf is not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to install (hardware) is included.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. The hardest part is making sure it is vertically level. The shelf bracket is adjustable in height and is held in place with two hex/allen screws, withe the wrench included. The glass shelf itself has a screw hole with a little flimsy rubber washer that keeps it secure. Use the flimsy washer so you don't scratch the glass with metal screw. Be careful not to over-tighten or you might break it. Doesn't have to be tight just screwed in enough to hold things together. Works perfect for my cable modem and WiFi router and cables can be tucked in if needed
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shelving system. I used one set for my TiVo and Blueray player, and the other set for my Internet cable modem, my wireless router and a VoIP box. Note that I painted the shelving metal and plastic components white before installation (with Rustoleum white acrylic spray, semi-gloss) Super easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: LeoG49

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Shelving For Light Loads
customer_reviews.text: The actual wall mounted "tracks" which secure the shelves are very robust. My only wish is that the individual shelves could hold a bit more weight. On mine, couple of the shelves began to sag, distorting the metal arms and mounts after I had placed my satellite box on one, and my Blu-Ray player on another one. Be aware of this if you purchase these shelves, and be mindful of their weight capacity.
customer_reviews.author: MrFreecam

customer_reviews.title: It works but feels flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: It works fairly well. It does feel flimsy because of how the shelves attach but it seems to work well. I have an Xbox one, PS4 and my Nintendo switch dock on it and they all fit reasonably well. The Xbox one and PS4 do hang over the edges once cables are hooked into the back of them but not by much. The cable management in the back of it is kind of a joke and really doesn't work that well so I zip tied all of my wires together and it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Justink81

customer_reviews.title: Really nice! PS4 hangs off about two inches though.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband’s ps4 and his sub. Works well. (Don’t mind the cords.. we are still working on cord management :)) The ps4 hangs off the front about an inch or two. Not a huge deal, but if that sort of thing bothers you.. there’s not a way around it. The glass is sleek and seems really strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This item is not held in any type of way to handle something or someone bumping into it. I accidentally bumped into the shelf and it shattered in a million pieces and took forever to get them u because it spreaded throughout my room. I am still finding pieces under furniture. It was a disturbing situation so if someone has children it can prove to be quite dangerous it should have been some type of way this shelf could be a little more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied - Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the two shelf product. The shelf unit arrived earlier than promised with no damage. The packaging is sturdy and the contents are well protected. Installation took under 15 minutes for us, but it always helps when you have the proper tools (drill, stud finder, etc). Once installed, the unit is very sturdy and the shelving is infinitely adjustable to meet your needs. The cable management feature allows you to nicely arrange device cables (HDMI, power cords, cabling, etc.). Overall, this unit is a great buy for the money. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Okie Bob

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Yes very easy to assemble even without instructions looks nice still need to try with cable box pros: Assembly easy Looks nice Cons: No level included Anchor screw easily stripped (Look at photos) Glass does not lay flat when set screw Is tightened Shelf easy to move after screws. tightened
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: It's okay..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have my boxes, etc on the wall since my TV is hanging above my fireplace. While the installation was easy, what I was disappointed about was the lack of cord management. We had to end up using a cord cover because the cords couldn't go down into the top or bottom of this shelf like I was expecting. When they go in from the sides, it still looked messy. Was going to return but had already mounted so just worked with it.
customer_reviews.author: Candice S. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: was easy to install but only comes w/concrete mounting hardware (Hence ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounted a flat screen TV in bedroom and wife didn't want exposed cables, this fit the need perfectly. Arrived quickly and on time, was easy to install but only comes w/concrete mounting hardware (Hence 4 stars), Went to Lowes and got Cobra TripleGrip HD DryWall Anchors rated @ 46lbs each. Had it installed in 45 minutes and put a Cable box, DVD player, PlayStation and to test it had room for and put a second DVD player and after 4 days no issues
customer_reviews.author: drebdog

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming console racks!
customer_reviews.text: These WALI shelves are sturdy, easy to install, and configurable. They are a convenient size for most video game consoles, which is how I used them. The cable tray in the back is nice and has enough space for three consoles’ worth of cords (power and video), but it takes a bit of forethought to use effectively. I plan on buying another set to mount a Genesis and 2600 along with the rest of my consoles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would order 20 of these if I needed them! Haha
customer_reviews.text: This wall mount looks very modern, but simple in our master bedroom! I don’t like floor space being taken up by entertainment centers/dresses & this was an amazing replacement for our electronics to sit on! Pieces were a little confusing, but as long as you thoroughly read instructions they explain it all! Definitely ordering the 3 tier for the living room! Live the adding of the space behind the shelf to tuck away wires to have more of a “clean” look! 9.9/10 for sure only because the plastic pieces seem to be on the thinner side!
customer_reviews.author: Trina Harwell

customer_reviews.title: Shelf unit can be used as separate 1 and 2 shelf units
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to get all routers switches etc. around computer high and out of the way. If you follow the instructions installation is not too hard as long as you have easy access to where you are installing the shelf. Backbone for shelf comes in two parts and enough screws and parts are included be able to set this up as a two shelf unit and a one shelf unit or as a three shelf unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bivans Enterprizes

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf system at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Instructions could be little better but good enough to install for DIY. Just a little suggestion that don't get confused, there are 2 wall posts that can be put tofether by removing spacer in the short one. In step 3,dont screw in the spacers, just a little bit to hold the spacersotherwise you won't be able to slide the assembly in thecwall post. For the price, it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Inder Pahwa

customer_reviews.title: Cost me way more then I saved
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this pile of junk. I got it installed it came home to my sons new Xbox one s broke on the ground along with the whole set up in a million pieces. Wall anchors still secure in the wall. Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.author: eelpusel

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, had some stability issues
customer_reviews.text: I had to return mine because it was not able to hold much weight. Because of the screws position, it would lean and spin and i ran the rest of of my Xbox sliding off. If you don't have kids and you have something fairly lights to put on it, it should be fine. It actually looks really great
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Love these shelves.
customer_reviews.text: I have three sets of these shelves in my home. Very easy to set up and quite durable. I have moved them from one house to another without any issues at all. I used different screws than what they came with as they were not made of the best material. That is to be expected with most things like this. I am the kind of guy that doesn't use stock hardware for assembling a lot of things. I will defanitly buy these again in ever I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We bought this shelving unit to hold our modem, router, and battery back up. The items previously sat on top of a bookshelf which was behind my desk. They were always in view of the camera when I video conferenced for work. My husband experienced no issues when installing this on the wall. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: TVD

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these units back in March 2018, and they are still working amazingly! I want to let you all know that I had a small issue that just recently came up with a shelf I was adjusting (over a year later by the way). I wrote customer service, and I had a message back with a fix within 30 minutes. This company really takes care of their customers, and it is much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Good product, small fix would make it great
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 star review but the slots on the back that allow for cable management are too loose and can fall out even when the product is mounted to the wall. I've had mine fall out 5-6 times already when attempting to route a cable. Other than that, it mounted in about 5 minutes and looks really nice with the smoked glass and dark arms. Truly makes the wall mount look professional and clean.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dorman

customer_reviews.title: Good but wobbly glass
customer_reviews.text: Decent shelf for sure. Well worth the money. Not five stars because I feel the glass should secure in the back and at the front. You can just pick up and wiggle the front of the glass and I feel this could cause unsteadiness or something to fall if bumped. It's difficult to usderstand the directions about hiding the cords but I figured it out. Between this and tying cords to the back of my tv I only have one single cord showing which I will eventually put at the ceiling and down the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Majdanski

customer_reviews.title: Instruction are missing steps
customer_reviews.text: Installing the shelfs on the wall mounted bracket are not describe or illustrated in the user manual. the little plates the come with the kit are screwed the the bracket loosely. Then you need to slide this plate in to the groove in the center of the wall bracket. Once everything it tighten the shelf is great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Valeri

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I wanted, inaccurate instructions, minor surface wear on product upon arrival. Not ideal for most game consoles.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Parts show some wear on arrival. Includes pieces not mentioned in the instructions, currently having a hard time figuring out how it all fits together. The pieces that ARE shown in the instructions don't totally match the ones in front of me. I have bought several similar shelves in the past but this is by far the most convoluted. I expect it will meet my needs once fully installed but overall there is much room for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Defective part, one of two shelf fell
customer_reviews.text: I received this two shelf order earlier this week. During the installation, I found a defective part that can make the product quite dangerous. One of the two connect pieces (D) is defective. Both holes on the defective connect piece is slightly larger and would not fit the M5x10 screws (P-C) tightly. This caused one shelf to fall after installation. Fortunately no one was injured and not part is broken. The other shelf and connect piece works fine. There may be some quality control issue. Just contacted seller for part replacement. If there is no prompt response, will return product.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! I bought this a couple months ago but just put it up about 2-3 weeks ago. It was nice until this evening when the bracket holding the shelf gave and shattered all over the living room. All it had on it was a Xbox one x which also crashed to the floor and is now cracked and broken too. This shelf is garbage and has now cost us hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla P

customer_reviews.title: Would be again, excellent quality, design, and instructions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 1 year ago and it sat in the box until I had the time and interest after moving. The quality is excellent of all aspects of this product, I would highly recommend it. A good studfinder is very helpful, if you don't have one, it will make the job harder, but overall it took me 20 minutes with the help of my oldest son.
customer_reviews.author: youtuber

customer_reviews.title: Good Floating Shelf
customer_reviews.text: I got this for use with my Xbox One, it works well & looks good. The sturdiness is ok, but it's a tension bolt plate that holds the shelf to the frame. Also the frame is aluminum alloy which can be stripped out easily if not careful. All & all I'm happy with the shelf!
customer_reviews.author: JD Brunson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Had this thing installed, only screwed in the "set screw" enough to touch the glass put a 5lb projector on the shelf had time to mess with angles and watch tv for a few hours, about an hour after going upstairs heard the shelf shatter into a million pieces when nothing and nobody was nearby. I would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, sturdy shelf for your TV accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect accompaniment to a wall mounted flat panel TV. Enough room and sturdy enough for a cable box, Apple TV, DVD player or whatever else you need to have close to your TV. There's also the added benefit of having all the cables hidden if your electrical outlet and cable lug is wall mounted. Very clean installation.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Supports a cable box (with caution)
customer_reviews.text: I installed this under a 32 inch tv. It's good for the price, but it does need to be improved. The cable mgt. system is useless. It's just a flimsy piece of plastic on either side. I ended up just using cable ties to secure the wires around the center piece. The shelf itself is wobbly so as long as you don't bump into it, it should be fine. It is only secured by one screw in the back and the front part of the shelf rests on the support with NO screws.
customer_reviews.author: benmusic28

customer_reviews.title: Don't assume that they gave you everything
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had the person who was going to set it up and to our surprise it was incomplete one of the bars the longest one was not in the package.
customer_reviews.author: luz lee

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were very unclear. Once you do get it together, it is hard to get any wires “hidden” where they are supposed to go. The shelves don’t stay level either. They aren’t going to move enough to dump your blu ray off, but enough to be annoying. It’s not bad enough to take it all down and return it either. But I wouldn’t buy it for another room.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieG

customer_reviews.title: Even tho it's not a corner shelf, it looks good even below a corner mounted TV!
customer_reviews.text: For not being a corner shelf, it sure looks good with our corner mounted TV! Please Take into account when looking at photos we have a game system and VR helmet up so there so all the wires aren't put away! Also just got a new motem after switching providers.. but there is wires stuffed into the rack and we plan on putting more. I think its very nice and durable and super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyLynne2007

customer_reviews.title: Made of heavy tempered glass, not metal
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, there is nothing wrong with this, except for the fact that it is made with tempered glass (which is quite heavy and could shatter) instead of metal which would be so much lighter and safer in earthquakes prone areas. It also looked intimidating to assemble, so much that I just decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: MaryK

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We thought this would be perfect for our gaming system under our tv however it was a little harder to assemble than we thought. Additionally the things we hold stuff on are really flimsy and can barely put anything on without being worried it is going to break.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: ... over a year ago and it looks and worked great. This unit is identical except its a 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 3 tier unit and installed it for my mother over a year ago and it looks and worked great. This unit is identical except its a 2 tier and I'm adding a new setup for my TV so I anticipate no less than my previous purchase. This unit is real easy to install and the wiring nice and cleanly tucks behind the provided space behind the mount. I would give this a 2 of 5 for ease of install and a 10 for finish appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not as “heavy duty” as needed.
customer_reviews.text: The shelves won’t support much weight. The fastener for holding the shelves will not hold the shelf level if you put much weight on it at all. It would be fine for smaller, lighter components. I’m going to end up putting pictures on it. For lighter components, it would be fine. For a heavier component like an amplifier, no good.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Duke

customer_reviews.title: Nice floating shelf unit!
customer_reviews.text: This floating shelf unit helps free up some table top space in our bedroom allowing us to use that space for other things. Now we can keep our 1 year old from opening up the Blu-Ray player and taking the discs out. The design is sleek and sturdy. I like that it’s adjustable. The cable management feature could be improved. It’s pretty difficult to figure out how to do it with three cords to hide. Would be helpful if they had a cable management demonstration video, not just one for general assembly. Overall, pretty satisfied, especially the price and what we’re using it for.
customer_reviews.author: RedHunt4ever

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy supports, will explode and send fragments feet away if broken.
customer_reviews.text: This can hold some LIGHT components but don't expect it to withstand much. Mine just exploded into a million pieces. There is a V shaped support under each shelf but it's not nearly enough. If you have a newer bluray player that's very light, that sort of thing would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: CDS

customer_reviews.title: Using this as a laptop stand
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of laptops and before buying this, had no easy way to store them while still allowing them to be docked with my monitor. This was extremely useful for this particular use case, and I would recommend it for someone who is switching between multiple computers frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Smith

customer_reviews.title: and look nice. My only complaint is the shield unit itself
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of the double shelf models, and I honestly kinda wished I had purchased a few more. They're incredibly secure, solid, and look nice. My only complaint is the shield unit itself, even when screwed in, doesn't sit in place perfectly and will shift a bit. That seems to be the common design choice for these models, but I do wish the shelf arms themselves had holes the tinted glass connected to for more stability.
customer_reviews.author: LetreivH

customer_reviews.title: Cool little wall shelf
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty easy for someone who knows how to use a drill and screw driver to install. Feature I liked is that it has 2 parts that each can serve as separate selves (a 2 shelf unit and a 1 shelf unit). The downside of this shelf is that is can't support much weight. I was perfect for mounting a small server, large drive, a modem, a router, Netgear camera hub, and a lighting hub. The directions could use a little better explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sims

customer_reviews.title: Saves all the clutter.
customer_reviews.text: I did not put it up my hubby did. To have it secured you’d have to of course find the stud in the wall and drill holes. The shelves are made of thick glass so it is not light. You’d have to make sure it’s secured to the wall. So overall easy to assemble but not easy to install if don’t have the proper tools.
customer_reviews.author: OhMyStarz_83

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and elegant. Perfect for small laptop - though with mistaken instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: Fits my DELL XPS13 perfectly as I wanted to place the laptop on small shelf to declutter my desk. Everything is great except for the confusing instructions - tells us to drill FOUR holes when the brackets only has two holes, and only two screws are provided - the manufacturer probably updated the design but forgot to do the same for instructions.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lau

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Great mount system for home theater, keeps wires away from babies. Was a little disappointed that the ps4 pri is about an inch longer than the shelve. But this is likely the best wall mounted option, and the aesthetics are great.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is glass so be careful, but absolutely gorgeous. Easy to put together, just follow the instructions and make sure your wall has studs. I had to use a stud finder to secure in place. I ordered this thinking I could use command strips and thumbtacks, but this requires actual screws. Just know if you are renting your place of residence you will have to cover these holes when you move out. LOVE THIS! THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Silver

customer_reviews.title: Straight Forward and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It is EXACTLY what it says it is in the description. It's easy to hang and assemble. It does everything it is supposed to and nothing that it doesn't. Arrived in good order, instructions were clear, packaging simple. Done. Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Like It Is

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install but chic
customer_reviews.text: This will tolerate up to 8 lbs apparently. Seems nice after in put my projector on it. Shiny black surface finish on top and adjustable level are the best feaures. But be careful ao you dont out too muxh weight on it
customer_reviews.author: Atolistiphication

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY
customer_reviews.text: I would like a refund! The shelf I got broke after it was put up on a wood wall. I had my cats food and water under there and the glass splattered everywhere! Under the bed, inside cat litter, food & water and on the other side of wall. This is totally unbelievable because it was put up right. I thought it would work, it had so many good reviews and i was excited for it. It looked good but it fell off and splattered glass all over the room.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and fairly sturdy shelf.
customer_reviews.text: These shelves look nice and do a good job handling weight. Might need periodic adjusting if they are being frequently touched or cleaned as the way they are held up is from metal clamping together.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf system, not very strong
customer_reviews.text: The shelves will not support anything other than pictures, and could barely support the cable box. When fully assembled the shelves are small and flimsy, I do not recommend for entertainmant center.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy good looking shelf
customer_reviews.text: The reason why it only got 4 stars from me is that the product images showing an XBOX One fitting on the shelf with room to spare a slightly misleading as it will hang over about 1 1/2 inches in front once all the cables are plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kostersitz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, needs better care when packing.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very nice. The wall bracket is very sturdy. It is holding my PS4, with two controllers (shelf 1) shelf 2 is holding my x box one x and two controller and a head set and the third several games and my cable box. I separated them so i have two and one. No complains on the strength of the glass or metal. However i gave it three stars because one of the glass shelf’s was very scratched. It really bugs me. Almost tempted to throw away because of my ocd but my wife forced me to keep.
customer_reviews.author: andres

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit for my home office to go with a new 50" TV. It installed quickly and easily. I already knew where the studs were so installation was a breeze. It works great for my Playstations and other gaming consoles.
customer_reviews.author: Keith G. Longley

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Installation was a little harder than expected
customer_reviews.text: The finished product looks great and does the job. However, the installation gave me some issues. There are 4 screws that are used to secure the wall mount to the wall. The instructions indicated to use a 1/8" drill bit to pre-drill the holes, but I found that was not large enough. When I went to screw the mount into the wall, the screws would not turn any more and I ended up stripping the screw head. Once I widened the screw holes, everything went fine.
customer_reviews.author: DougJ

customer_reviews.title: be sure to get better ones. I was not satisfied with the size
customer_reviews.text: Parts that come with the item are not adequate for securing, be sure to get better ones. I was not satisfied with the size, a PS4 does not fit properly on the shelf, my cable box barely was able to fit completely. the backing on it does not support the enclosure of most wire sizes. I was unable to get anything behind it. Lastly, it was not steady. The construction of it left it shakey. I would not have purchased this item knowing this ahead of time and I ended up replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf and GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is well built and looks good. Great customer service....I was a long time installing these shelves, well past the return period. When I finally got around to opening the package, I found that a part was missing. I contacted the seller and was promptly shipped the missing part, no questions asked. I would definitely purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: KAR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wall mount!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to put up under a new TV, and I was nervous as a lot of shelves seem to have a problem of "easy to break/won't hold enough weight". Well, this one has been excellent! We followed the instructions, mounted it to the wall, and it has been great! I have a DVD player and often a laptop up on this mount, and it hadn't shown any sign of not holding. I would recommend for anyone looking.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Also holds flat screen TV that can't be wall mounted
customer_reviews.text: I helped redecorate my grandson's room, and we wanted to put his 18" flat screen up on the wall, but it did not have the correct set up on the back to do so, so this shelf was what I chose as an alternative to a wall mounting. The shelf is well made and sturdy, and held his 16 pound television set without problem (we did tie the base of the TV to the back of the shelf, just to ensure safety). On the second shelf we placed his cable box. The stem of the shelf hides all the cords! It looks great! The sleek, modern look and smokey glass shelves appealed to my grandson. Overall, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JoanOH

product_meta.title: WALI Floating Strengthened Tempered Glass for DVD Players, Cable Boxes Games Consoles, TV Accessories (CS202), 2 Shelf, Black
product_meta.description:
Size:2 Shelf| Color:Black

WALI Floating Shelf System

 * The ultra-slim WALI wall mount has an all-black coating and adjustable shelf height to enhance the look of your entertainment system and free up floor space.

 

Product Specifications:

 * Maximum Support Weight 17.6lbs (8kg) on Each Shelf.
 * Wall Plate: Made whit high-quality aluminum alloy material. Size is 14.12 x 3.12 x 0.75 inches (L x W x H), with top and bottom plastic cover wall plate is 15.74 inches long.
 * V-Shape Bracket: Made with high-quality steel. Three rubber mats on top to improve stability.
 * Glass Shelf: Made with strengthened tempered glass with the black opaque coating. Size is 15” x 11” x 5mm (Width x Depth x Thickness).
 * Cable management system to hide all the messy cables.
 * Simply loosen the connecting piece to adjust the shelf height.

 

Package Included: 

 * WALI Floating Shelf System (Black) x 1
 * Strengthened Tempered Glass x 2
 * Mounting Hardware Kit x 1
 * User Manual x 1
feature_bullets: Supports a maximum of 8KG (17.6 lb) on each shelf
Two Large Strengthened Tempered Glass Shelf (15 x 11 inch each shelf and thick 5mm)
For DVD/Blu-Ray Players, Satellite/Cable Boxes, Games Consoles, Hi-Fi and Surround Speakers
Cable Management System to hide all your messy cables
Easy to use instruction manual for quick and easy mounting with fittings provided

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars8,577 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
